https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y1oFNynXrIzlPUe4CXKMR2dpNep.jpg Stig is a 15-year-old pupil of 37-year-old teacher Viola. He is attracted by her beauty and maturity while she is drawn to him by his youth and innocence, a godsent relief from her drunk and miserable husband. All Things Fair
